author: vmassol
msg: MPEJB-2: EJB client jar can now be generated and deployed/installed automatically by the standard goals (ejb, ejb:ejb, ejb:install and ejb:deploy). Previous goals dedicated to ejb client have been deprecated. There is a new property maven.ejb.client.generate which decides whether or not to generate the ejb client jar. It defaults to true.
